messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE REPORT: #G-7891-TL DATE: 11/23/35  The quiet town of Pineville was shocked when the Pineville Art Museum reported the theft of the famous painting Whispering Meadows. The painting, valued at over $10 million, disappeared during the museum's annual gala.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  LEAD DETECTIVE: Detective A. B. C. York has been appointed to spearhead the investigation. Renowned for solving high-profile theft cases, Detective York's skills will be paramount. FORENSIC SPECIALIST: Detective D. E. F. Green, an expert in art theft forensics, is currently examining the frame and wall where the painting was hung, searching for clues. SECURITY DETAILS: Captain G. H. I. Rowe is coordinating with the museum's security staff. They are studying CCTV footage to identify any suspicious activities. PATROL OFFICER: Patrol Officer J. K. L. Turner, who was present near the museum during the gala, noticed a high-end car speeding away. The vehicle's description has been circulated. ART FRAUD INVESTIGATOR: Detective M. N. O. Wells, with extensive experience in art-related crimes, is reaching out to potential black market contacts to gather information. The Pineville community is rallying together, urging anyone with information to come forward.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective A. B. C. York  
Officer Context: Detective York is leading the investigation into the painting theft.  
Officer Role: Detective

Officer Context: Detective Green is specializing in art theft forensics for this case.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Captain G. H. I. Rowe

Officer Context: Patrol Officer Turner reported a suspicious vehicle near the museum on the night of the theft.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
